<event2_trigger> make

<event2> [make] out it

<sentence2> The main positive for Castro to invite the Pope is international , to be able to say to the rest of the world , this government is not as closed , as intolerant , uh as totalitarian as some make it out to be .
<masked_sentence1> The main positive for Castro to invite the Pope is international , to be able to say to the rest of the world , this government is not as closed , as intolerant , uh as [MASK] as some [MASK] it out to be .
<masked_sentence2> The main positive for Castro to invite the Pope is international , to be able to say to the rest of the world , this government is not as closed , as intolerant , uh as [MASK] as some [MASK] it out to be .

<event2> Gas be [affected]

<sentence2> A senior dealer with Warburg Securities noted British Gas , the most active blue-chip stock at 20 million shares traded , was affected by the political implications of Mr. Lawson 's departure and Mrs. Thatcher 's cabinet shuffle .
<masked_sentence1> A senior dealer with Warburg Securities noted British Gas , the most active blue-chip stock at 20 million shares traded , was [MASK] by the political implications of Mr. Lawson 's [MASK] and Mrs. Thatcher 's cabinet shuffle .

<END>

<relation> BEGINS
<order_flag> e2->e1
<event1_trigger> consummated
<event2_trigger> merger
<event1> merger be [consummated]
<event2> [merger]
<sentence1> A unit of DPC Acquisition Partners launched a $ 10-a-share tender offer for the shares outstanding of Dataproducts Corp. , and said it would seek to liquidate the computer-printer maker '' as soon as possible , '' even if a merger is n't consummated .
<sentence2> A unit of DPC Acquisition Partners launched a $ 10-a-share tender offer for the shares outstanding of Dataproducts Corp. , and said it would seek to liquidate the computer-printer maker '' as soon as possible , '' even if a merger is n't consummated .
<masked_sentence1> A unit of DPC Acquisition Partners launched a $ 10-a-share tender offer for the shares outstanding of Dataproducts Corp. , and said it would seek to liquidate the computer-printer maker '' as soon as possible , '' even if a [MASK] is n't [MASK] .
<masked_sentence2> A unit of DPC Acquisition Partners launched a $ 10-a-share tender offer for the shares outstanding of Dataproducts Corp. , and said it would seek to liquidate the computer-printer maker '' as soon as possible , '' even if a [MASK] is n't [MASK] .
<END>

<order_flag> e2->e1
<event1_trigger> closed
<event2_trigger> trading
<event1> ORGANIZATION [close]
<event2> [trading] on ORGANIZATION
<sentence1> In trading on the New York Stock Exchange , Cineplex closed at $ 11 , down 25 cents , with more than a million shares changing hands .
<sentence2> In trading on the New York Stock Exchange , Cineplex closed at $ 11 , down 25 cents , with more than a million shares changing hands .

<masked_sentence2> In [MASK] on the New York Stock Exchange , Cineplex [MASK] at $ 11 , down 25 cents , with more than a million shares changing hands .
<END>

<order_flag> e2->e1
<event1_trigger> 3.7
<event2_trigger> 4.2
<event1> [3.7]
<event2> [4.2]
<sentence1> Sales were C 4.2 billion compared with C 3.7 billion .
<sentence2> Sales were C 4.2 billion compared with C 3.7 billion .
<masked_sentence1> Sales were C [MASK] billion compared with C [MASK] billion .
<masked_sentence2> Sales were C [MASK] billion compared with C [MASK] billion .
<END>

<event1_trigger> sold
<event2_trigger> became
<event1> [sell] by employee
<event2> [become] worthless
<sentence1> In nineteen ninety-one Charles Keating was convicted in state court of helping to defraud thousands of investors who bought high risk junk bonds sold by Keating 's employees at Lincoln savings and loan .
<sentence2> The bonds became worthless when the bankrupt thrift was seized by government regulators .
<masked_sentence1> In nineteen ninety-one Charles Keating was convicted in state court of helping to defraud thousands of investors who bought high risk junk bonds [MASK] by Keating 's employees at Lincoln savings and loan .
<masked_sentence2> The bonds [MASK] worthless when the bankrupt thrift was seized by government regulators .
<END>

<event1> [resign] to pursue
<event2> not [successor]
<sentence1> Reuters Holdings PLC said Michael Reupke resigned as general manager to pursue unspecified interests , a move the news organization termed an `` amicable separation . ''
<sentence2> No successor was named , and Mr. Reupke 's duties will be split among three other senior Reuters executives , the company said .
<masked_sentence1> Reuters Holdings PLC said Michael Reupke [MASK] as general manager to pursue unspecified interests , a move the news organization termed an `` amicable separation . ''
<masked_sentence2> No [MASK] was named , and Mr. Reupke 's duties will be split among three other senior Reuters executives , the company said .
<END>

<sentence2> The directors added that the two executives have n't reached a final decision to proceed with a bid and that until an offer is made the board will continue seeking higher offers from other bidders .
